extendedInfo.description: Itâs "GO" time! Take a ride on the Reading Railroad. Buy Boardwalk. Go directly to Jail. Buy, sell, and trade the famous MONOPOLY properties, and see the game jump to life with animated features and easy gameplay. Challenge friends and even customize the game rules!**GAME ALERT** Play Bejeweled Blitz. Treat yourself to an exciting take on the world's #1 puzzle game from PopCap! New players Get 100,000 Coins Free. http://smarturl.it/blitzEMPLOY HANDS ON MANAGEMENTTap the screen to manage your properties â from Marvin Gardens to Water Works to Park Place. Building hotels or taking a âChanceâ is simple and intuitive.   CHOOSE YOUR LEVEL AND LOOK Play through 3 levels of difficulty and save games in progress. Also customize the number of players, the game rules, and even the game environment.Enjoy MONOPOLY in the tradition of the beloved, best-selling board game! Be the first to know! Get inside EA info on great deals, plus the latest game updates, tips & moreâ¦VISIT US: eamobile.com/androidFOLLOW US: twitter.com/eamobileLIKE US: facebook.com/eamobileWATCH US: youtube.com/eamobilegamesCheck out more exciting games from EA like The Sims FreePlay, Need for Speed Most Wanted, Theme Park, World Series of Poker, and FIFA 12!For more information about the third party targeted ad serving and analytics technology in this app and data they collect, see End User License Agreement:http://tos.ea.com/legalapp/mobileeula/US/en/GM/

reviews.title: Does work on android
reviews.comment: I\'m giving a 4 cause I\'m showing update for some phones but which ones. My HTC evo from Boost works fine. Issues of low memories and invalid files is the android .my current is 4.0
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work on galaxy 2 tablet
reviews.comment: Waisted money on this game.  It doesn\'t work and can not get any support from EA!!  And I can not figure out how to get my 8 year-olds $4.99 refunded to her!  Very upset and disappointed in EA!!  Will not purchase another EA game!  EA, please refund my daughter\'s money!
reviews.author: kaylie ryan

reviews.title: Fun game!
reviews.comment: Fun game, easy to beat level 3 is easy so perdictable. I wish the ai player was smarter in all levels. The get out of jail free card works untill the 2nd roll of the dice, after the 3rd you have to pay $50 dollars regardless, the get out of jail free card no longer works.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Duplicated
reviews.comment: If you have monopoly pre installed on your phone and purchase the app from the market the game will be duplicated on your phone. Furthermore, the pre installed app costs more. Lastly, when emailing ea games, do not email help@EAMobile.com, all you get is a worthless auto reply. I will not purchase another ea game again.
reviews.author: Jake Erdman

reviews.title: Fun but the computer cheats!
reviews.comment: As the difficulty level increases (why there even is a difficulty level option on a random roll game is beyond me) the computer player suddenly starts rolling numbers to miss your houses and hotels...every time he goes around the board! Then suddenly, you start to roll numbers that have you landing on the computer\'s properties like crazy. It\'s just obvious and it drives me insane. Makes me not want to play the game anymore.
reviews.author: Danielle Miles

reviews.title: Decent Game
reviews.comment: I have always loved Monopoly. However, I am the competitive type, so I love playing against other people. I was really hoping for an online version of Monopoly, one that I could play against other players online. Is there a plan to release an online multiplayer version of the game? If so, that will definitely be the day I rate this game 5 stars.
reviews.author: Ryan Shukis

reviews.title: Lucky for EA there isn\'t a rating of 0
reviews.comment: Loaded game to see if it\'d work on my phone. All it does when i go into it is send me back to my main screen.  My advice, don\'t think it\'ll work on your phone. Just pass it by.  You\'re better off buying a lottery ticket. You\'ll have better odds in getting something back for your money.  Even if it was free, it\'ll still be too much.
reviews.author: Robert Harris

reviews.title: Garbage. I want my money
reviews.comment: I paid $5 for this game and can\'t play it. It WILL NOT download the extra content needed and I\'ve connected to numerous wifi sources... I want my money back asap
reviews.author: Jennifer Egan

reviews.title: Waste of money
reviews.comment: I bought his game for my samsung Galaxy tablet 2 AND OF COURSE for the 5 dolar price. I just want to say that this game is a waste of time and money. It will not open and when I tried to see costumer support it didnt have anything! I  also tried to get my 5dollars back too, but that is only withen 15minutes. 15  minutes to get your money back WTF. This game doesnt  work on my tablet. Waste of money.
reviews.author: Rayna Kruzona

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: It worked when I first purchased it, now it doesn\'t. I have uninstalled and reinstalled it and it still freezes my Galaxy Tab and S3. It sucks!
reviews.author: Malinda Brown

reviews.title: Plays like it should
reviews.comment: I guess i got lucky i play on the samsung galaxy note phone (1) and it is a blast just like being a kid again except now i win most of the time. Highly recommend the purchase.
reviews.author: mark woolfson

reviews.title: Upset User
reviews.comment: I purchase this game and it doesn\'t run on my Galaxy Tab 2 Tablet I get a error message. There isn\'t any support you can contact at EA. Very poor service. out $5 + dollars.
reviews.author: Edward Husa

reviews.title: Game does cheat.
reviews.comment: Update 11/29 this App cheats. I pulled a chance card to advance to Go & it moved me 1 space instead.  I have a Samsung Nexus 4G S & it wasn\'t working on the 11/23 but I uninstalled it & reinstalled it & set it on 3G for upload and now it works great.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great Game!
reviews.comment: This game works great on my Bionic. You can change some rules of the standard game to something different like getting $400 when you land exactly on GO, or getting some money when you land on free parking. I think EA did a great job on this game. One thing to note however is it does drain the battery! :)
reviews.author: Jim Horne

reviews.title: I want my money back
reviews.comment: The only reason I got this was for multi player and you guys gipped me worse buy ever  I WANT A REFUND
reviews.author: Ashley Guerra

reviews.title: Ripped off by ea again
reviews.comment: Game says server error go to ea and click customer support. When I do that there is no help for that issue. This is such bs. No refund ability.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Its monopoly offline.
reviews.comment: The game works as intended. I didn\'t feel that the dice rolls are manipulated. The only thing that sucks is that you can\'t play with your friends online.
reviews.author: Eddie Araujo

reviews.title: Needs work
reviews.comment: Using galaxy s 3 seems to be wrongly sized. Please update this app. I purchased and haven\'t played one complete game because of the quality.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Server error?!
reviews.comment: Paid for it, loaded it.. Does not work! Can\'t get my money back and I have a non-functional game... Thanks for nothing.
reviews.author: Erik Dalton

reviews.title: Poor is to good of a rating
reviews.comment: I have never had a game glitch so much you spend more time trying to fix it then playing the game. Somebody needs to shut these guys down before they rip more people off does not work for the Samsung S3
reviews.author: A Google User
